recipes.name: Tomato & Oatly Veggie Rice Bowl
recipes.description: A quick, high-fiber dinner featuring zilvervliesrijst (brown rice) paired with sautéed Romaatjes (baby tomatoes) and a creamy Oatly barista sauce for a nutritious and comforting meal.
instructions: 1. Cook the AH Zilvervliesrijst according to package instructions (usually 20-25 minutes in boiling water). Drain and set aside.
2. While the rice cooks, halve the AH Romaatjes and sauté them in a non-stick pan with a splash of water or a tiny bit of oil for 5-7 minutes until softened.
3. Add 1 cup of Oatly! Barista Edition to the tomatoes, stirring on low heat for 2-3 minutes to create a light, creamy sauce. Season with salt, pepper, or dried herbs if available.
4. Serve the cooked rice in a bowl, topped with the tomato and Oatly sauce. Enjoy as a simple, fiber-rich meal.

recipes.name: Tex-Mex Veggie Wraps
recipes.description: A high-fiber, flavorful dinner using AH Gordita wraps stuffed with seasoned Romaatjes, brown rice, and a sprinkle of Tex-Mex cheese for a satisfying and quick meal.
instructions: 1. Cook the AH Zilvervliesrijst as per package instructions (about 20-25 minutes). Drain excess water.
2. Halve the AH Romaatjes and cook them in a pan with a splash of water for 5-7 minutes until soft. Mix in the taco seasoning for flavor.
3. Warm the AH Gordita wraps in a dry pan or microwave for 30 seconds.
4. Assemble the wraps by layering cooked rice, seasoned tomatoes, and a sprinkle of AH Tex-Mex geraspte kaas. Roll up and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Italian Rice & Tomato Salad with Yoghurt Dressing
recipes.description: A refreshing, fiber-packed cold salad with brown rice, Romaatjes, and a tangy Skyr yoghurt dressing, perfect for a quick and healthy dinner.

ingredients.name: Arla Skyr naturel yoghurt 0% fat - 1 small tub (about 150g)
AH Salade erbij italiaanse mix - 1 pack (about 100g)

instructions: 1. Cook the AH Zilvervliesrijst according to package instructions (20-25 minutes). Let it cool slightly after draining.
2. Halve the AH Romaatjes and toss them with the cooled rice and AH Salade erbij italiaanse mix in a large bowl.
3. In a small bowl, mix Arla Skyr naturel yoghurt with a pinch of salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lemon if available to make a light dressing.
4. Drizzle the yoghurt dressing over the salad, toss gently, and serve as a fresh, high-fiber dinner.
recipes.imageUrl: data/img/receipe_img/Italian Rice  Tomato Salad with Yoghurt Dressing.jpg

recipes.name: Groente Macaroni Fiber Feast
recipes.description: A simple, high-fiber pasta dish using vegetable macaroni, Romaatjes, and a touch of Oatly barista for creaminess, ideal for a quick and wholesome dinner.

ingredients.name: AH Macaroni spaghetti groente klein - 1 pack (about 200g)

instructions: 1. Boil the AH Macaroni spaghetti groente klein according to package instructions (usually 8-10 minutes). Drain and set aside.
2. Halve the AH Romaatjes and sauté them in a non-stick pan with a splash of water for 5-7 minutes until soft.
3. Stir in 1 cup of Oatly! Barista Edition to the tomatoes, simmering on low heat for 2-3 minutes to create a creamy sauce. Season with salt and pepper.
4. Mix the cooked macaroni with the tomato-Oatly sauce and serve hot for a fiber-rich, comforting meal.
